About

This is a demo page for Visual Regression Test Article

Introduction

Visual Regression Testing allows us to make visual comparisons between the correct (baseline) versions of the site with new versions

Grid Section

BackstopJS

It is a framework written in JS which help to automate visual regression tests so easily and faster and provides easy-to-configure test parameters for a variety of viewport sizes and pass/fail conditions
